name: entity-resolution
description: Entity Resolution Service with Record Blocking for ArangoDB
author: Entity Resolution Team

defaultSimilarityThreshold.description: Default similarity threshold for entity matching

maxCandidatesPerRecord.description: Maximum number of candidate pairs to generate per record

ngramLength.description: Length of n-grams for blocking keys

defaultCollections.description: Default collections to use for entity resolution (comma-separated). Leave empty to require explicit specification in API calls

autoDiscoverFields.description: Automatically discover and index all fields in collections when no field mapping is provided
